actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-472, by Mr. Woodall.

The resolution provides that an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 112-21 shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended, are waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 648.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 177 (Roll no. 244).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 183 (Roll no. 245).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5652) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2013.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5652) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2013.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5652) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2013.
